settings.subheading: Of AtomStack and Probably in The Market
settings.title: Most Powerful Blue Laser Engraver & Cutter
settings.video_file: shopify://files/videos/AtomStack A24 60W Laser Engraver One-piece Design Requires No Assembly.mp4

settings.title: Stable 12W Optical Power
settings.content:
Introducing the AtomStack A12 Pro: AtomStack’s brand new second-generation laser engraving machine boasting an unparalleled 12W optical power.

  • Ultra-fine laser focus area is reduced to 0.06*0.6mm
  • Easily cut 15-20mm thick wooden boards and 10-15mm thick black acrylic
  • Directly engrave mirror stainless steel Metal, ceramic, glass, engraving.

settings.title: Brand New One-Piece Design
settings.content: The AtomStack A12 Pro crafted from anodized full aluminum alloy, this design ensures durability and engraving precision. Plus, it's one-piece frame design, calibrated with precision before shipping, allowing you to use the perfect machine right out of the box.

settings.title: Highest Level of Accuracy
settings.content:
Stable structure and high speed significantly enhance work efficiency
The maximum engraving speed can reach 600mm/s
which is 3-6 times that of traditional frame machines

settings.title: Locate The Engraving Area More Clearly
settings.content: The AtomStack A12 Pro newly added cross laser positioning feature for clear visibility of the laser’s location, perfect alignment for engraving, and easy horizontal adjustment.

settings.heading: Reviews On AtomStack A## Pro Series

settings.title: Highlights
settings.content:
1. Unprecedented Power: The world's first laser engraver boasting a 12W optical power. With a cutting-edge combination of two 6W lasers.

2. Sturdy and No Setup Required: Crafted from anodized full aluminum alloy, this design ensures durability and engraving precision. Plus, it's one-piece frame design, calibrated with precision before shipping, allowing you to use the perfect machine right out of the box.

3. Enhanced Motion Structure: The AtomStack A12 PRO sets a new standard with its superior structural stability, employing a linear guide for the X-axis. This ensures smooth operation at high speeds of up to 600mm/s, yielding perfect engraving and cutting lines without any shaking.

4. Cross Laser Positioning: Newly added cross laser positioning feature for clear visibility of the laser’s location, perfect alignment for engraving, and easy horizontal adjustment.

5. Advanced 32-bit Motherboard: Our latest AtomStack innovation features a 256-bit color scale, delivering unparalleled engraving clarity and contrast. Now, vibrant projects aren't just a dream!

6. AtomStack Mobile App: Available on major Android and Apple stores, our custom-designed app provides a unique, seamless control experience. All in the palm of your hand!

7. Eye-Protection Redefined: Our panoramic filter glass cover shields eyes effectively, blocking 97% of UV light. No more goggles; observe your engraving in real-time, safely.

8. State-of-the-Art Fixed-Focus Laser: No more pre-engraving adjustments. This laser's focal spot is notably smaller and more precise, marrying detailed engraving with powerful cutting.

9. Universal Compatibility: Supports a plethora of engraving software like LaserGRBL and LightBurn. Compatible with numerous OS and file formats, ensuring flexibility in your projects.

10. Detailed Axis Scale Lines: Precise scales on the X and Y axes enable swift measurements. With a generous 365*305mm engraving area, all your project needs are covered.

11. Double Compression Spot Coupling Technology: Ultra-fine laser focus area is reduced to 0.06*0.6mm, high-density laser can easily cut 15-20mm thick wooden boards and 10-15mm thick black acrylic; it can directly engrave mirror stainless steel Metal, ceramic, glass, engraving. Its performance rivals that of a 150W CO₂ laser engraver.

12. Integrated Screw Rod: An all-in-one design for the stepper motor and screw rod ensures pinpoint laser accuracy and enhanced durability.

13. Convenient Laser Adjustment: Newly incorporated knob facilitates easy height adjustments.

14. Extreme Sintering Temperatures: Laser sintering reaches up to a searing 1200℃.

15. Side-Over Warning: Built-in gyroscope detection, when the tilt angle of the machine is greater than 15°, an alarm will be triggered, making engraving safer.

16. Emergency Control: An incorporated stop button ensures immediate response during unexpected situations, enhancing safety.

17. Built-In Limiter: Included for added safety and precision.

18. Reset Capability: Built-in for user convenience.

Specification:

Brand: AtomStack
Model: A12 Pro
Engraving Size: 365*305mm
Overall Machine Power: 50W
Laser Output Optical Power: 10-12W
Laser Wavelength: 455±5nm
Laser Spot: 0.06*0.08 mm
Focusing Mode: fixed focus laser, no focus
Laser shield: There is a protective shield on the laser that protects the user's eyes, no need to wear additional goggles.
Operating Software: LaserGRBL, LightBurn, Supports Windows/Linux/macOS
Supported File Formats: JPG, JPEG, SVG, PNG, BMP, PDF, G-Code, DXF.
Data Transfer Method: USB, APP
Power Supply: International standard power
Input: 100-240V AC, 50/60HZ
Output: 24V 5A
Certification: CE FCC RoHS FDA PSE
